short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle show hide on your password field

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a password display thing - swaps password fields on pages between text field and password field.
Use a password manager, come up with a system...as a last resort, use this.
